about_the_game:
Everything has turned into nothingness. You will start from scratch on a strange island, pick up your hoe and weapon, and bring hope back to this mutated world. You are the only hope in this world. This is a game about the relationship between environment and humans. In the game, you will play the only surviving human in this world, and turn the mutated island into a vibrant Hope Island through your efforts, bringing green vitality back to the world.
Game Features:
● Adventure puzzle survival game! Survive on a mutated island!
● Collect all the supplies necessary for your survival.
● Build survival gear, weapons, and other equipment to help you survive!
● Eliminate mutated plants and creatures, transform the land to make it more suitable for plant growth.
● Find hidden treasure chests, overcome difficulties, and get the rewards inside!
● Obtain seeds of creatures and plants.
● Cook, grow crops, take care of animals, and make your island vibrant.

Game Development Status:
The game is currently in the middle stage of development, with a relatively high work progress and complexity. Moreover, I am the only one developing it, so the progress is relatively slow. After all, various resources are relatively limited. I hope the players who are concerned can understand. But please rest assured that. This is a game that will definitely be released for sale, and I will not give up. I will also do my best to make the game well.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: this game is an adventure puzzle game that combines survival, role-playing, and strategy elements. In the game, you will survive on a alienated island in third-person perspective, eliminate mutant creatures, purify the land, obtain plants and animals, and build your own green home on the island.
